# UITextDropProposal.Performer.delegate

**Case**

A performer type that indicates the delegate object is responsible for doing the drop operation.

## Declaration

```swift
case delegate
```

## Discussion

If this performer is used, the delegate must implement the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UITextDropDelegate/textDroppableView(_:willPerformDrop:)] method. Otherwise, the text view handles the drop operation, which is the same behavior as specifying [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UITextDropProposal/Performer/view] as the performer.

## Performers

- **UITextDropProposal.Performer.view**: A performer type that indicates that the text view is responsible for doing the drop operation.
